title: Land with paddy mountain view
details:
Land spotted along the Galle Akuressa road
3km for Nugaduwa High way (Fairway proprty) color lights
5km for Galle City
This land surrounded by lush green mountain and paddy view
There are two foreign owned villas (uppermost villa) in adjoining lands.
Concrete wide access roads to the land
There is an access road towards Kalahe village .if you want can access both side to the land.

Galle fort 15 mints
Jungle beach 10mints
Unawatuna beach 15mints


This is ideal investment for echo tourism or residential purposes,




Price Negotiatable after inspection
